summary: Results-focused management professional with 25 years of progressive leadership experience in operations management, staff development, inventory control, and sales. Proven ability to transform high-potential staff into effective leaders and to implement cost-saving operational improvements and revenue growth through strategic planning and Lean initiatives.

experience.title: Sales Team
experience.description: Delivered unparalleled customer services; greeted and assisted customers, responded to inquiries and complaints in a professional and timely manner; communicated product knowledge and recommended merchandise; trained in visual merchandising and organization; monitored sales activities and productivity; ensured register transactions were completed accurately and in accordance with policy; demonstrated excellent verbal and written communication; strong organizational and multitasking abilities in a fast-paced environment.

experience.title: Sales Team
experience.description: Provided outstanding customer services; maintained displays and store appearance; ensured customer satisfaction at every stage of sale; opened and closed the store per company policy; recommended new products and upcoming events; broad expertise in advertising and promotion.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Management Lead overseeing long- and short-term plans aligned with strategic goals; managed expenditures within the annual budget; implemented operational improvements to enhance quality, production times and reduce costs; conducted time studies to reduce labor hours; implemented an inventory software program to streamline communication across purchasing, inventory, engineering and production; experienced with Lean Six Sigma; supervised large teams; proficient in Microsoft Office and PowerPoint; performed project management and ensured safety compliance; monitored productivity and optimized procedures; managed 60+ vendor relationships; delivered projects against scope, budget, schedule and customer expectations; developed production tracking and quality control systems; implemented new product lines through research and development.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Developed and operated four assisted living locations; obtained and maintained annual state certifications; supervised security, transportation and monitoring; managed day-to-day facility operations and admissions; coordinated services including nursing, dining, housekeeping, activities and maintenance; oversaw new resident move-ins and orientation and supported the admission process through tours and follow-up calls; monitored budget compliance and financial outcomes including labor and accounts receivable; oversaw payroll and ensured accurate activity documentation; kept current on regulatory changes related to Assisted Living and Dementia Care; recruited and onboarded staff and managed HR duties; conducted marketing events and outside sales calls.

education.school: Nelson County High School - City, State

certifications: MSHA approvals (Product, Breathable Air, Harmful Gas Removal, Gas Monitoring, Structural)
